channel.title: Chase the Fox Website Updates
channel.description: Up-to-date additions and changes to Chase the Fox's website!

item.title: Episode 1, Page 6 Live
item.description: Added page 5 for episode 1 of Tale Chasers.

item.title: New Character: Azalea
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Azalea Swiftpaw, the fox swordswoman.

item.title: Episode 1, Page 5 Live
item.description: Added page 5 for episode 1 of Tale Chasers.

item.title: Episode 1, Page 4 Live
item.description: Added page 4 for episode 1 of Tale Chasers.

item.title: Episode 1, Page 3 Live
item.description: Added page 3 for episode 1 of Tale Chasers.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Sikori
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Anthro species, Sikori.

item.title: Episode 1, Page 2 Live
item.description: Added page 2 for episode 1 of Tale Chasers.

item.title: Tale Chasers Comic
item.description: Introducing "Tale Chasers", a new comic featuring Chase and friends!

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Fleel
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Feral species, Fleel.

item.title: New Character: Foxblade
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Foxblade, the kitsune samurai.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Ratatosk
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Monster species, Ratatosk.
